choices: Shuichi Saihara the Ultimate Detective!
Makoto Naegi the latest Ultimate Luck
Kaede Akamatsu the Ultimate Pianist
Chiaki Nanami the Ultimate Gamer
Somebody else...
1.title: Shuichi and Makoto? Chiaki and Kaede?

choices: Rantaro hears booming footsteps approaching the boys.
Makoto finds a chest! He opens it before the others can react.
Nagito falls in a trap.
Water starts to fill the room.
Some monsters attack them.
11.content:
Shuichi could still barely believe what was going on. Here he was sitting in class reading a case file when Chihiro Fujisaki the Ultimate Programmer burst in and asked him to help test her new VR game. The fledgeling detective was reluctant wondering how he could be helpful at all over say Nanami or Miu. Surely they would be better he reasoned to her.
"No-no-no-no Shuichi it can only be you! Please,please,please Shuichi!"
"Bu-but Chihir-"
"PLEASE!!"
"Al-alright" he'd stammered out.

He was not expecting the small girl to be so forceful and had essentially been dragged into her computer lab where he'd met with her other volunteers and become even more curious about why he was here.
The enigmatic Nagito Komaeda and the bright cheerful Makoto Naegi were waiting inside. In addition to the two Ultimate Lucks the most popular boy in Shuichi's own class Rantaro Amami the Ultimate Adventurer was inside seemingly shielding the nervous and younger lucky student from the odd and older one. Whatever the three were up to they stopped upon seeing the Programmer and Boy Detective enter.
"Ahhh it's..." Nagito started
"SHUICHI!" exclaimed Makoto running over to the boy.
"So you're here to help Chihiro too? What kind of game exactly did you want us to test for you?" asked Rantaro.
"Thank you all so much for coming everyone I'm so glad you did! I've brought you here to help me test my new invention! It's an immersive vr game called Despair Dungeon and in it you'll get captured by monsters and stuck in traps!"
"Now none of us are on Nanami's level or anything Chihiro but your acting like we're all terrible at games here. I'll have you know I've beaten a bunch of adventure games and I bet the others have beaten some as well."
"Actually Amami I'm pretty bad at video games...sorry for being worthless trash"
"Nagito being bad at video games doesn't make you trash! I'm pretty bad at them too!"
"AHH Naegi you always know just what to say to cheer me up c'mere you precious lucky boy!!"
Nagito pulled Makoto into a clearly unwelcome tight hug which the smaller boy did his best to wiggle out of to no avail.
"RANTARO HELP HE'S DOING IT AGAIN!!"
"Haha you two, Nagito let him go. Come on now break it up"
"Ahhh but he's just as soft as I'd always hoped..."
"I'm pretty good at mystery and puzzle games." Shuichi said doing his best to neither catch Nagito's attention or Makoto pleading looks.

"The games designed with the four of you in mind but I've made it more than challenging and realistic enough for you to still have fun." she continued ignoring the struggling Lucks "All you have to do is lie down in these pods and put the helmets on to enter the game then once the system is booted up you'll enter the game. Once that happens I'll activate the pods which will do their best to simulate what you feel in the game."
"Now wait a minute Miss Fujisaki I'm a bit concerned at that part." Makoto snickered at that statement for some reason.
"D-Don't worry! I promise nothing in there will hurt you and I will be monitoring everything from here on this televsion here."

Chihiro showed them a very large screen with several comfortable recliners set up. The one in the center had a number of keyboards set up in front of it.
"Why so many seats Chihiro?"
"Ohh uhh I'll be having some assistants help me Rantaro. Now please enough questions and lets get underway. I can't wait to have you guys play my Despair Dungeon. Everybody climb into the pods please."

Chihiro hustled the four boys fretting over and rushing them as they lay down in the pods and donned their helmets. When the clamps around their ankles and wrists activated they panicked a bit but were put at ease quickly by Chihiro's explanation.
"It's just so the machine can't get damaged. Some people thrash about in their sleep. Alright guys off you go!"

With the flip of a switch a low hum could be heard by the foursome. Nagito was the first one to succumb to sleep with Rantaro shortly after. Shuichi's eyes were getting very heavy when he heard a voice outside the pod.
"Chihiro are they ready yet?! WE'RE GETTING LIKE TOTALLY BORED OUT HERE!"
"Wha...why..Jun-Junko's hereee" Naegi mumbled before falling asleep himself.
"FUCKING FALL ASLEEP ALREADY"
"Miu??" Shuichi forced himself up slightly fighting the unconsciousness that was rapidly overtaking him. He saw a group of different women crowding through the door some who he recognized as his fellow Ultimate students from the Academy! That last little bit of shock was too much as he gave out and fell asleep in the pod. A grinning Chihiro took his place in the lead seat in frontof the screen and gestured for his guests to do the same.
"Alright ladies now we get to enjoy the show but don't forget the main event tonight!"

When Shuichi awoke it was to Nagito and the others over him as lay on the ground. Right away he noticed the cold floor away and was impressed at Fujisaki's programming skills. It really felt like a cold and slighty wet dungeon floor, the whole place felt drafty and wet. He tried to get up but found something incredibly heavy weighing him down also he realized that he was next to naked. All he had on was a small furry loincloth which itched a good bit in the butt (How exactly was Chihiro simulating that?) as well as a pair of heavy fur boots. Once Komaeda helped him undo the strap on his chest and he looked at the humongous sword that been weighing him down it clicked in his head.

"Ohh I'm the barbarian of the group. Could I get some more clothes though or at least a sword I could actually pick up? CHIHIRO! PLEASE?! CLOTHES!"
"Ahh don't bother Saihara we've been trying for abit and Fujisaki either isn't there or just doesn't care about us in here. It's probably because you've got a piece of trash like me weighing you down."
"Nagito knock that off. There's probably some problem with the system stopping him from helping us here. Chihiro wouldn't just leave us here."
"Yeah Makoto's right. Calm down Nagito she's probably trying to help us right now."
"Ahh how just like the Ultimate Adventurer, so cool in the face of pressure. Who am I to even dare to doubt an Ultimate? I hoped I was better than that but I guess I am still just trash."
"If I'm the barbarian what are you guys then? I'm guessing from the robes that Komaeda's some kind of mage?" Shuichi said trying to distract the boy from one of his typical spirals.
"Well done. I am the mage I suppose I tried earlier and I can make a bit of fire and ice. Hopefully I can finally be useful!"
"I'm pretty sure I'm the thief!" Makoto chimed in "I found a bunch of bottles and knives in my pockets and if we find a chest I bet I could open it."

They all looked at Rantaro with the sword at his side and the bow on his back he responded with an almost embarrassed shrug.
"Adventurer of course. What are you gonna do. Honestly this is pretty amazing it's like we're really in the game. This is pretty great, Makoto tell your girlfriend it's amazing when she let's us out."
"CHI-CH-CHIHIRO'S NOT MY-I MEAN WE-HOW WOULD I-WE'RE BOTH-I-I-"
Rantaro laughed at the quickly reddening boy before waving it off.
"Just teasing you a little Makoto that's all. All things considered there's worse places to be stuck for abit."
"I-I WOULD LIKE SOME CLOTHES!"
"Huh? Ahh yeah you are kinda letting it all hang out there aren't you Shuichi Hey Makoto think you could give him your cloak at least?"
"Of course if I had more I'd give it but unless Shuichi wants to wear knives..."
"Anything helps thanks, it's so cold down here."
"Saihara come get close to me then! I don't have anything under these robes sure but there's enough room under them for two so if you let me hold you we could warm each other up. To make it even better Naegi could probably fit in and keep us both warm with glorious Hope! Ahhh it'd be so great not to just help an Ultimate but Hope itself as well."
Shuichi looked pleadingly at Makoto who shook his head and inched closer to Rantaro. The detective turned with the full intention of turning the eccentric luck down but instead was swallowed whole by a tidal wave of light blue fabric as Komaeda didn't wait for an answer to share his clothes. Underneath the robes he wasted no time bearhugging Shuichi close to him despite his struggles to pull away.
"MmmppgghlemmegoNagghito!!"
''Ahhhh your breath's so warm Saihara but your skin's just so cold, Naegi you should really come and help me in here with him.''
Komaeda's nail's dug into Shuichi's sides during their struggles.
''MmmpheeeheheheLEMME GO!''
With that exclamation he shoved off Nagito with a shocking amount of strength forcing the older boy off.
''Ohh I'm so sorry Saihara! I was just trying to help in anyway I could but of course a piece of trash like me bungled it up''
The boys were interrupted by...
11.title: A slow build...

choices: Shuichi runs for the chest while the Ogre goes for Naegi! (He makes it!)
Shuichi stands still waiting for the deal to be honored.
Shuichi runs for the chest while the Ogre goes for Naegi but he trips....
111.content:
"Hold on a second guys." Rantaro interrupted "Do you feel that?"
"Feel what Amami?" Nagito asked but was shushed by the Boy Detective Shuichi who gestured for him to come over to a puddle he'd found. As the boy's crowded around it they observed the ripples that almost rhythmically disturbed it to the footsteps of something large drawing near. The boys looked up and saw a giant hand quickly approaching them out of the darkness. Rantaro tackled Naegi out of the way before it seized him. As the boys watched on in amazement as a giant ogre with long white hair stepped out of the shadows towards them. Curiously the horrible and warty beast wore a ripped schoolgirls uniform and trainers.

"That's cruel Chihiro." Naegi mumbled drawing the beasts attention towards the boys once more.
"Ahhh and what twist of fate has brought these four to my domain? Come once more to challenge the strongest ogre Have you? I must say you
look a good bit tastier than the last few that came through. I'll have to be a good bit carefuller this time so that you don't break!"

With that the giant lunged with deceptive speed quickly scooping up Komaeda in one hand as the teen yelled in fear the beast reached with the other hand for Shuichi who was frozen before it. If Rantaro hadn't seized his hand and pulled him and Makoto out of the way the hand probably would have seized him as well. Without missing a beat Rantaro whirled around and started lashing blows at the Ogres hand but all that got him was grabbed as well. He kicked and punched at it as he was lifted away while Makoto finally snapping out his trance started hurling knives at the beast with little to none effect. Annoyed at the two it distractedly swiped at the short thief who barely avoided getting caught himself.

They were doomed at this rate and Shuichi realized it. It wasn't even paying attention to him and Naegi instead pulling down spiders web and using it to bind Rantaro and Nagito's wrists and ankles together with each other so that the older two of the were tied back to back with their wrists above their heads. It then pulled down another loop and securing it around it's own thick neck then tying it to the boy's ankles. The monster stood and allowed it's captives to dangle uspide down while Shuichi hustled Naegi down a passageway where the female ogre had no chance of fitting. They both looked on in horror at their friend's Rantaro and Nagito turned into an accessory for the beast. It took it's two massive index fingers and drove them into both teen's sides simultaneously due to their size.

"Wait now let's taAAAhalk waihiht!!"
"Ahahanoot thihihis! Hahaow did you knohoww?!"
"Ahhhh delightful. I have been given a good batch of toys tonight. Do not worry I will be careful not to break you too soon." The musclebound beast cooed as she stroked her two up and down the sides of her pieces of giggling jewelery.

Makoto went pale at the sight of his seniors being tormented so strangely and went to try and help but was stopped by the Ultimate Boy Detective.
"What exactly do you plan to do?"
"Guheehheeys heeeheehllpp!!"
"We've got to help them Saihara!"
"Of course but how exactly were you planning to do that? Your knives did nothing earlier and rushing in will only get you grabbed as well-wait!"

While chiding Makoto, Shuichi had noticed the ogre attempting to slyly watch them. Anyone else wouldn't have noticed but Shuichi had quickly picked up on it's increasing speed in the torment of his friends. Earlier it had been careful to keep it slow enough that the boys could at least speak, perhaps it enjoyed the begging? Once Naegi had made to leave though it's attention had been divided and because of that it was going at the boys bit too hard this was leading to Nagito drooling redfacedly as he laughed in silence. They couldn't see Rantaro's face but they imagined it couldn't be much better.

"Well??" The Ogre boomed "You would keep a lady waiting and abandon your comrades? Are you but the basest of cowards?"
She ceased her stroking of the boys and pinched off Rantaro's boots and Nagito's soft clothen shoes. It pulled them off gently leaving both boys socked feet exposed to the dungeon air and the beasts predatory gaze. When it's large and slimy tongue emerged Makoto looked away while Shuichi marveled at how it was basically the same size as his whole body. The beast wrapped one hand around them to bring them closer and give a long slow lick.
"He-hey what's ha-HAAAHWHHA?!" Rantaro screamed as the the monsters tongue dragged over his and Nagito's feet. The sticky tongue sucked both of his and one of Komaeda's socks clean off. The remaing sock barely hung off Nagito's toes but he still clenched them tightly to keep it. The Ogre however had plans of letting him keep it and with a "gentle" blow of air (That could've probably knocked any of the boys off their feet) sent it spiraling down to the dungeon floor. It went for a second lick over the now naked tootsies as Shuichi restrained his remaining friend. The Adventurer and Luck struggled in it's grasp but judging from the way it smiled at their efforts, it seemed to enjoy a little fight in it's prey and used it's tongue to chase the wiggling feet down. It wrapped around them grinned as a look of pure ecstasy overtook it's face while Komaeda and Amami's faces were bright red as they thrashed to and fro in uncontrollable laughter. As the tongue curled around their feet it felt like the very tastebuds themselves were peeling apart their toes whenever they tried to scrunch them up to offer some protection then invading the sensitive, virgin and unbearably ticklish crevices.. Somehow it felt to the teens like every single sensitive nerve in their feets had two to three tongue to care for them and they did it with relish. Komaeda, overwhelmed by the sensations had lapsed into a silent gag as he was sampled like a lollipop. Rantaro had tried so hard at first to resist the laughter and clenched his teeth to try and give a little precious hope to not only Nagito but also to Shuichi and Makoto. The beast noticed it though and with an extended slurp broke the Adventurer's dam of willpower and with it came tidal wave of laughter. His normally cool demeanor was replaced with unstoppable laughter that quickly turned the green haired teen's throat hoarse.

The Giant finally retracted it's tongue from around the boy's feet and gave them a break. It sat and turned the boys right side up to inspect it's handiwork as the boy's greedily took in air, grateful for the respite.
''You two would hide while your friends suffer so? Does their torment mean nothing to you?''
''No! Shuichi we need-''
''She's trying to play us into coming out. She can't get at us in here and so she's trying to get us to come to her.''
''The gloomier one of you is not wrong at all. This room is to force a tough choice upon those who enter it. I prefer to have one toy to play with whom I can focus all of my attention upon until they break and I must give them to the bear. Normally those who come in here have to face that I will take one of them. Those adventurers can either leave me my prize or attempt to defeat me to free them.''
''And how often do they do that? Not frequently I'm assuming if you willing to tell us like this.''
''The scantily clad boy is right to ask. None have ever defeated me here. The only way forward is to leave something to occupy me.''
''Shuichi we can't leave them here! They're our friends!''
''IT'S JUST A GAME NAEGI!''
''It clearly doesn't feel like that to them! When Nagito tickled you earlier what did that feel like? A game or did it feel exactly like the real thing! Chihiro wouldn't program a roadblock like this to stop us before we even start! There has to be a way to stop it or else why would it be trying to convince us to leave?''
''Yo-You're right! That doesn't make sense.''
''A moment. You two may doubt me but I do not wish you to leave. The one of you I want is the smallest one who refuses to abandon his comrades. He possesses a strong faith in his friends that I want to test to it's limit. Should he come out and give himself to me I will release both of my captives and amuse myself with him instead. I have seen such small and dainty feet on a male and am entranced with the idea of what they will taste like. Your belly as well seems like it would be fun poke and play with before the bear prepares you for the steel horse.''
''M-Me?!''
''No! How do we even know you'd let them go?! Naegi we're not going to do this!''
''You wish a guarantee? Fine I will show how certain I am. That chest over there in the corner.'' The Ogre gestured towards a chest in the shadows that had escaped their notice until now. ''Opening would activate a trap. In it is a poison that would knock even me unconscious. Should one of you manage to open it I will drink it. There is no chance you could though.''
''You could still be ly-''

Shuichi stopped mid sentence as Makoto dashed past him in the opposite direction of the chest.

''HA! Without a moment's hesitation! Wonderful! You will be a joy to train!''
With that she placed down Nagito and Rantaro and took off after Naegi.

''Maybe I could make it to the chest before she caught him? Would she even still honor the deal?''
111.title: Rantaro hears booming footsteps approaching the...

choices: He can't do it. He breaks down laughing and pulls away. IT'S PUNISHMENT TIME!!
Somehow, someway he makes it. The ogre gives him rest as a reward.
Shuichi and the others make an attempt at saving their friend!
1113.content:
Makoto looked over his shoulder to see the ogre bearing down on him faster than he could've ever expected as well as his friend Shuichi running as fast as he could towards the chest in the other direction. He breathed a sigh of relief that he'd understood his plan then sharply turned to try and throw off the monsters balance. He sneaked a look to see if it'd worked and only saw a giant hand rapidly approaching and blocking out all light. He just barely ducked under it but still yelped when it snagged ahold of his hood. After a seconds thought he shrugged out of the jacketed cloak but clicked his tongue when his shirt went with it, He'd underestimated her speed, skill AND strength now. If it hadn't been for him being alot more nimble in the game she would've probably had him in a stew pot already. He heard a shout and saw that Shuichi had tripped and fell flat on his face. That was his last mistake though as in less than a second his small feet left the ground as he was scooped up by the monster. He beat and bit at the hand as she laughed at his fighting spirit.

"Ahahha! Come now my little treasure. You ran a good race and had a fine plan. No doubt you thought that you could distract me long enough for your friend to reach the chest and hoped I would honor my deal."
On the ground Shuichi clenched his fists as tears welled in the corner of his eyes. Her uproarious laughter did nothing but make the young Detective feel worse. When she suddenly picked him up like as well his stomach sank like a rock.
''Fret not I will honor our agreement young one.''
She gently placed Shuichi by the passageway he and Makoto had previously been taking shelter in as she returned with the still weak Rantaro and Nagito. She pulled off their bindings as Shuichi still trembled at how he'd failed his lucky friend. Komaeda's hand's flashed with weak electrical energy as he tried to muster up a spell.
''NAGITO STOP! DON'T DO IT!''
''What?! But-but Naegi why?!''
''Stop and think! If she wanted all four of us it'd be easy right now! If she's willing to take just me you guys should be happy and just go!''
''No that's wrong Naegi we can't leave you! Saihara tell her to take a piece of trash like me instead!''
''Nagito's right Makoto we can't just leave you here!''
''HA-HA YOU ARE A FINE GROUP OF ADVENTURER'S! Most have fled without a word or wasted their allies sacrice on attempts to defeat me. Such honorable actions greatly interest me. ''
''Wait-''
''No that will be enough actually humans. Farewell to you now."
With a strong breath she forced the three boys down the passage away from her and their friend. With ease she picked up a boulder and placed it in front of the hall effectively sealing it.
Seeing the anxious expression on her captives face she reassured him
"Worry not. They are unharmed I'm sure. I took great care in that all that would happen was they would be removed from the boulders path."

"We-well thanks for tha-UGAAHH!!"
Naegi's nervous thanks was cut off by a gigantic pair of lips covering not only his face but all his upper body in one giant smooch. He tried futiley and almost cutely to push back against it but it was like an ant against the ocean as he was pinned to the ogre's hand by the force that was it's lips. When he felt the monsters hot breath start to intake he could barely breath himself and when it's tongue snaked and dragged over him he couldn't do a thing. He wanted to laugh because by god it was the most ticklish thing he'd ever felt in his life. It felt as if it was made up of a million tiny feathers that were incredibly stiff yet still wet feeling, They sucked gently wherever they touched and if he focused through the tickle induced haze over his mind he could almost hear a million tiny pops as the tastebuds moved mournfully from one ticklish inch of his body then gleefully sampled another. His legs kicked and his fists beat on her chin trying to force her to free him, but when the tongue curled and began on his face all his limbs became so much useless jelly. He'd been tickled on his nose and cheeks before by his sister and while he hadn't liked it all, it hadnt made him convulse like this. The tongue dragged around searching for something. It investigated his ears a little bit before it found what it was looking for. His poor little lips were poked and lapped at like they were so much candy. It took every last ounce of energy little Naegi had to keep
them closed. Finally with a horrendous yet surprisingly gentle suck the giants kiss ended and Makoto was released from it. The giant smiled at the young lucky adventurer as he gasped for air.

''We-were-WERE YOU JUST TRYING TO EAT ME?!'' he screamed still dripping in saliva.
''Eat you? If I wanted to do that do you not think I would have there? That was but a gentle kiss to show gratitude for your telling your friends to leave the two of us be.''
''That-THAT'S NOT WHY I TOLD THEM TO LEAVE!''
''Oh? Then why did you? Could you have done it only because you knew that I could easily capture all four of you?''
''Well-It's....''
''Yes, Yes what you did was very brave and yes you are deliciously sweet. Now let us move on with this life of servitude of yours.''

Naegi shifted uncomfortably at the abrupt way she said such a horrible thing as he sat back up. Still barring some kind of miracle that seemed like what was going to happen here. There was no chance of him actually being able to defeat the ogre and he'd already tried a few times to remove the helmet and take himself out of this game. They hadn't heard a word from Chihiro since he'd put them in here. Makoto didn't want to doubt one of his friends but there was no way that Fujisaki didn't know what was going on in here. Had he maybe left the lab? Well then where could he have gone!?

''Remove your shoes pet.''
That snapped him out of any thoughts about the Ultimate Programmer and right back to the reality of this virtual reality.
''Wh-wha-what?! No-no I-I''
''No?! Who are you to be saying no to your owner? If I wished to eat you right here would you be able to stop me?''
''Wait pleas-''

A giant's finger suddenly shoved Naegi right back over onto his back. It pinned him down again and dug into his defenseless belly. He squirmed and squealed beneath the giant digit while the angry ogre continued.
''WaiaHHAaht!! Hehheeehahaha.''
''Are you going to stop me? If I wanted your feet bare I could do it but your here to be trained as a pet So remove your shoes as ordered or the punishment your going to get will be worse.''
''Puhuuahnishheeeh-SNNHEK HAAHHAA''
As the young Ultimate descended into snorting belly laughs he frantically waved his hands for it to stop. The cruel ogre stopped and looked quizzically at the boy who barely had the strength to to try and sit back up.
''The shoes, pet. Off. Now.''
''Pl-please don-'HEEEEHHIIIHEEENOOOOHO'
The finger went right back to it shoving him back down and dug back in as Naegi broke down into squeals. He beat on the finger which only made the giant sneer and dig into his stomach deeper.
''Ohhaakahy Ihihi gihieeve!''
''Very well.''

This time he wasted no time and got the shoes off quickly as the finger hovered over him threateningly. He showed the now empty boots to her then put his hands as if to show there was no tricks but was instead quickly dug back into. This time Makoto didn't even try and instead beat his fists meaninglessly while his ticklish tummy was tenderly tortured.
''Wahahy! Ihihi dihihd itehe-SNNNRK-KAHAHEHA!''
''Socks.''
"Snnnrrkk-Ahakay juhuhs tahahp"

This time the cherry red boy was quick to follow orders and get his socks off. His teary eyes looked up at the one who ordered them off as she scooped them up with his socks and gobbled them up. Then she came back for him with the damn finger. He tried to beg her not to but was quickly gotten again however this time she was much gentler drawing out giggles rather than snorting belly laughs.

"Heeheeeu I dihihd ihiht."
"Yes you did pet. This is a treat for you,unless you'd prefer how things were before?"
"NOohohha this is fiHEEHEne"
"Now you will show me your feet. They are prizes I would like to admire."
With that order she released him and watched expectantly. Makoto quickly sat up and unsurely presented his small feet. When the ogre motioned for it he raised them up, when it continued to motion he obeyed until eventually he was on his back once more but now with his feet in the air for the ogre to admire.

"Roll over and keep them in the air. Do not lower them or move them at all."
"O-o-okay.." he rolled upon his belly while keeping his small feet in the air. On the one hand he was extremely glad to have his tummy safe from the ogres probing digit, but with his feet now clearly it's new target-
Once more Naegi's thoughts were scattered by tickles overwhelming his brain. The ogres slimy tongue dragged across his unsuspecting soles and toes driving him wild. He immediately pulled away just on instinct.
"Ahahawait I wasn't expecting that. I'm sorry, please I'm sorry!''
''One more chance. 15 LASHES. MOVE AGAIN AND THE PUNISHMENT WILL BE SEVERE!

Naegi shivered at the expression on the giants face as he rolled back over. He didn't know what she meant by punishment but the severity of it would probably be bad. The tongue came again and Makoto's hands balled into fists.
That was one.
Naegi started pounding his fists as the second tongue lashing came, at three he bit his into his lip. At the fourth he realized that there was no chance he was going to be able to do this.
1113.title: Shuichi runs for the chest while the Ogre goes ...

choices: Continue...
11131.content:
The Ultimate Lucky Student pulled his feet away and curled up into a ball bawling and snorting as he laughed up a fit.
"Haheeha-SNNNRRK-heeehnooho-SNNRK-ahha cahan't"
He squirmed and twisted at how his soles still tingled from her assault before going quiet at seeing her expression.
The ogre stared at him with raw anger, he shrank away from it and tried to stammer out an apology.
"I'm so-sorry please it just tickled s-s-so much!"
"It tickled? Compared to what is coming for you soon you'll beg to go back to this. I think the bear has left me the perfect thing to punish an unruly pet."

With that she picked up Makoto by his ankles and wrapped him in her massive grasp so that only his poor still tender and tingling feet were exposed to the dungeon air. Makoto felt her start to take steps and shivered in fear at what they were on there way to. When the familiar tongue of the monster ravaged his feet once more though he thought of nothing else than how could such a massive organ so specifically target his toes?! At about 9 licks towards her tootsies pop the ogre's captive lost consciousness.

Makoto Naegi didn't think his luck could get any worse. When he first came to this school as an Ultimate Luck two years ago he couldn't believe his own. His opinion of his luck had only gone downhill since then when he'd ended up getting bullied, picked on and played with by more than half his upper-classmen, four of his own classmates some of his juniors and one very mean grade-schooler in a wheelchair who'd put a frog in undies. To make it worse to him the other Ultimate Luck attending the school was one of the worst ones to him. He still shivered when he thought of what'd happened when he'd accepted his invitation for a sleepover. Two weeks later he'd been found by the headmasters daughter Kyoko hidden inside the body pillow Nagito had kept him in (To keep him safe! He'd said! I've seen that serial killer Genocide Jack near your dorms Makoto!). If it wasn't that it was experiments with Iruma, punishment games with Celestia or just generally being tossed around by Chabashira. He'd made it through all of that just to end up here thanks to one of the few people in his class he considered a close friend!

As he blinked the sleep from his eyes he tried instinctively to stretch as though all of that had been a bad dream and now he was waking up in his own bed, warm, happy and safe. He found though that he couldn't move his wrists at all as they seemed to have been secured behind his back. He scanned the room and saw nothing but darkness until he looked and discovered two things, that he sat astride a motorcycle for some reason and that someone had undone his trousers so that his manhood now stood free before him. Kokichi smiled clownishly.

"Ooooohhh, you got some balls talking back to me in this position!" He eyed Rantaro's feet again. His aura changed to that of a kid who had his toy taken away. "Aww... look at me, spending all this time talking when I could have your toes in my mouth. You know how lack-toes intolerant I am!"

"Aww, are you gonna be like one of those nurses with no sense of humor...?" Kokichi then grinned impishly. "Too bad! Cause it looks like I'm the nurse now, and I say it's a perfect time for jokes!"

The boy had mentioned getting out of straitjackets before, and now he was mentioning nurses as though he'd himself been a mental patient. Well, that didn't surprise Rantaro one bit. The question was, how does one handle a difficult, mischievous mental patient like Kokichi?

He decided to appeal to his childish side.
"Kokichi, listen. When we get out of here, I'll buy you all the candy you want and let you watch any cartoon you want. Then we can go adventuring around the world together. Won't that be fun?"

"Neeheehee! Sure sounds like it!"

Rantaro gave the boy a defiant glare. "But I'm in charge. I make the plan to save everyone and you have to follow."

"Hmm..." Kokichi put a finger by his lips, considering. "Candy and cartoons? And around the world adventure? But I already get those things when I'm with my organization. What else you got...?"

Rantaro thought about it; he had to think fast! "Your parents! You haven't seen them in a while due to being in a mental hospital! You could see them again!"

At this, Kokichi reeled and he looked horrified. "No! No, anything but that, please!" He started trembling and his face went paler than it usually was. Rantaro was surprised when the boy started crying. Those were genuine tears of distress.

"Kokichi..."

"Please, no! Don't do that! I'll be good! No, no, no, no, no!" He closed his eyes and shook his head. It was painful watching the boy in this state. Rantaro shed some tears as well as Kokichi cried in distress. Minutes passed, and no one came into the room. (So he'd been bluffing about that.) Then, Kokichi had meant what he said earlier about the Cat-Taurs being busy with the other prisoners. It was rather distressing being alone with a crying peer you'd accidentally triggered. If Rantaro had his hands free he would have reached out to comfort the boy. As it was, all he could do was wait. Finally, Kokichi composed himself. "I-I'm sorry... I'm sorry..."

He looked up, and saw Rantaro. Narrowing his eyes at him, he spoke in a hoarse voice.

"Fine, you're in charge. J-Just don't give me back to them, please..." Kokichi hated how weak he sounded.

"I won't," he promised, inwardly hating Kokichi's parents. Whatever they'd done to him had severely messed him up, making them the most likely cause of Kokichi's mental hospital stay. He hated child abusers with all his heart. He might have to pay a visit to their house or jail cell later though, to have a "word" with them.

"Promise...?"

"I promise." Rantaro said. Kokichi undid the boy's straitjacket clumsily. Finally, he was free. Kokichi muttered.

"Whatever your plan is, it had better be good!"

Curiosity peaked Kokichi. He loved playing with candle wax. He dipped his fingers into the wax. It was lukewarm, the perfect temperature. The wax hardened around the boy's fingers. Then he skipped over to Rantaro.

"Hey, guess what?" he whispered. Mischievously, he slid his new finger-caps along the back of the boy's neck.

"Gahh!" Rantaro screeched, startled. He turned around angrily. "Kokichi!"

"Waxy fingers!" he grinned childishly, wiggling them in front of his face. "Nee-heeheehee!"

"Be more serious!" Rantaro warned. "You don't want us to get caught!"

"Sowwy," Kokichi pouted.

They walked for a while through the cave. Things were taking too long, and Kokichi started whining that he was bored. Rantaro shushed him and said they were almost there. The boys listened and heard a faint laughing in the distance.

If Kiibo was ticklish to bodily repairs as a robot, he was super ticklish as a human in a virtual program.

It sounded like they'd been at it for a while. His breath came in airy and light, not enough energy to still be frantic, and his normally pale skin was now reddened from the sensations. He'd been strapped into foot stocks and had his shirt, socks, and shoes removed.

A single woman rested by his feet, brushing them with bristly hairbrushes.

All poor Kiibo could do was laugh.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAHHAAHHAHAHAHHAA!"

Rantaro hid behind a rock. Kokichi smirked. And now to divert the Cat-Taur's attention.

"Hey, ugly! Over here!"

As soon as the woman turned around, he sprinted away. She growled and followed him.

Rantaro then ran over to Kiibo and picked the lock of the stocks. (Kokichi had taught him how.) Kiibo was quite winded. He didn't realize he'd been rescued until he felt himself being picked up. Registering who it was, Kiibo breathed a sigh of relief.

"I see you managed to escape. How is that possible?" Rantaro kept it short and simple.

"Kokichi. He's on our side. We thought up a plan to free everyone, but it's a bit sporadic. The idea is to catch everyone off guard."

He quickly explained the plan to Kiibo. Kiibo was worried about Kokichi, but Rantaro said part of the plan was to lose the Cat-taur in the darkest parts of the tunnels. If Kokichi isn't back by the time they rescue Shuichi, they'll go back and rescue him. Kiibo nodded.

"Sounds like a plan. Now then, off to save Shuichi!"
111311321123.title: Wild Card! Save Kiibo, then Shuichi first, othe...

choices: Kokichi has returned.
Kokichi has not returned...
1113113211231.content:
Shuichi's hands were tied behind his back, with his feet held together and to the ground with metal bonds. His furry shoes rested beside him. He had two Cat-Taurs attacking him currently, one spidering her fingers along his neck, and the other going along his ribs. A third should be there, Kiibo thought, but maybe she left to get more tools.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA! BAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHHAHAA!"

The boy tried to beg, but his laughter was too strong.

Rantaro looked at Kiibo, nodding to give him the signal. Kiibo looked ahead and saw three tunnels leading away from this one. He had to make sure not to lead the ladies to Nagito's chamber by accident. His night vision activated, and he zoomed in on the three tunnels (somehow the program had let him keep his robo-functions, even though he appeared human). Concluding that Nagito was kept in the middle tunnel, Kiibo took a rock and threw it into the left tunnel. The two Cat-Taurs looked up, wondering what could have made the noise. They stood up and went to investigate. As soon as they left the chamber, Kiibo ran over to Shuichi. He used his heat vision to melt the metal bonds that held the boy. Rantaro untied his hands.

"Phew... You guys came just in t-time..." Shuichi said. Another minute, and he felt he would be done for! He rubbed different body parts to try and make the tingling go away. Kiibo scooped up the boy effortlessly.

"Come on, we need to hurry and save Nagito!" he pointed to the middle tunnel. Not wanting to waste time, Kiibo carried Shuichi to the other room instead of waiting for him to recover. Rantaro followed behind closely.

Nagito was in an arguably worse position, with two Cat-Taurs by his feet and one teasing his upper body mercilessly. They decided to give him a short break so he could beg. After all, they did find his begging adorable.

"P-please! Stop... Ahahaha... N-no more... Hahah..." His face was flushed as he continued. "A-after all... W-why waste time on a piece of trash like me...?"

The ladies smiled.

"Trash boy cute. Handsome."

Nagito didn't know how to respond. He hadn't gotten many compliments in his life. His face remained flushed as he caught his breath.

"Okay," the second Cat-taur said. "Break over!"

The first one scribbled her nails over his belly, while the other scritch-scratched along the arches of his feet. Nagito lost it.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAA! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAA!"

Suddenly, the lights went out. The Cat-Taurs were confused. They searched along the walls for the candles and torches. But when they finally found and re-lit them, Nagito was gone!

...

"Alright," Kiibo said to Rantaro as the boys made their escape. While he carried Shuichi, Rantaro carried Nagito. "I looked and saw that the right tunnel leads out of here. That'll be our escape route!"

"Good. We'll save Makoto once we're out of here." Rantaro replied. "But first, we need to meet up with Kokichi! He helped me escape, after all."

Well? Has Kokichi returned... or has he been caught...?
1113113211231.title: High pitched laughter comes from deeper in the ...

choices: Kokichi feels he's about to faint, when...
11131132112312.content:
Opening his eyes, Kokichi realized that he was stretched out on the floor. Oh yeah... he'd been careless and gotten himself caught. One too many times he'd shouted out in the dark. Too bad he had such a teasing nature.

'Oh well, after all the evil things I've done, I probably deserve this.'

Still, as the Cat-taur approached, he felt apprehension and fear.

"Husband try to leave me! He a bad boy!"

"Yeah, sorry. I don't know what came over me." He shrugged, keeping it cool.

"You only pretend to love me! You liar!"

"If you're going to punish me, make it quick. I don't like waiting."

"I not punish you because you hurt me! Instead sisters punish you! I go cry in room!" She ran off, visibly upset. And then in came her big sisters. Kokichi stared at them wide-eyed.

"I never even agreed to the marriage! I swear!" He shook his head. "The woman made up our relationship up in her mind!"

And yeah, maybe Kokichi had played along with it just a little to manipulate her into doing what he wanted. That was probably a bad idea...

"You bad boy. And bad boys need be taught lesson!" One of them took out a bottle of baby oil and dumped it on his feet. The other took out some feathers and brushes and began brushing all the oil off, scrubbing madly, going in circles, and fingering between his toes, any little thing to make the boy suffer.

"GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHA! AHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAA!"

He couldn't take it. He went to hysterics in an instant, shedding tears.

While the second sister was busy by his feet, the first went to his underarms and dug her fingers in, swirling in circles. Kokichi's laughter went silent. He couldn't take this! Why, why, why, why, why?!?!

When the sister by his feet decided his feet were clean enough, she changed positions and went to his belly.

"Did you know bellybutton dirtiest part of the body?"

If Kokichi had heard her, he didn't reply. He knew what was coming. She took the baby oil bottle and dumped some in his navel. Then she took a Q-tip and began cleaning it. This made the boy jerk and shed more hysterical tears.

"NAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAAHHAHAA! HAHAHHAAHHAHAHAAHHAHAAHHAHAHAHA!"

When the woman was done, she used her finger to clean out the excess, swirling more than necessary, leaving Kokichi a giggling wreck. The other sister switched positions and tickled his neck, making him scrunch his shoulders.

"STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHHP! AHAHAHHAHHAHAAHHAAHA! PLEHEHEHEHEHEHEEHEASE!!"

The torture felt like it had gone on for more than ten minutes. The only time he'd been tickled this much had been in a huge tickle fight with his organization. And they'd listened when he begged them to stop.

Kokichi was exhausted. The two had decided he'd had enough, but promised they'd be back tomorrow, after they got some rest.

"Rantaro... please don't forget me...." he muttered as he closed his eyes, ready to fall into the world of dreams.
11131132112312.title: Kokichi has not returned...

choices: Kiibo finds the exit! But what's that pink creature...?
111311321123121.content:
Rantaro watched the two Cat-taurs leave the room, and saw Kokichi tied to the ground. He heard what Kokichi said. Tiptoeing to his side, Rantaro bent down and started untying the ropes that bound him.

"I haven't forgotten you, don't worry."

Kokichi wasn't sure if he was dreaming. So he just laid back and smiled. Rantaro held the boy close and carried him out of there. At least that was over with, Kokichi thought. And it was far from the worst thing that happened to him. The worst thing that happened... He suddenly became really sad.

"Rantaro..." the boy muttered against his shoulder. He may have been a bit delirious. "I'm sorry I never told you..."

"Hmm?"

"About my parents... and the way they hurt me... They molested me..."

Rantaro stopped, and examined the boy's face, looking for any sign of a joke or lie. He was dead serious.

"I know I should have told the cops right away. But it wasn't all painful. Th-they made me feel... special."

The boy started crying.

"But I wasn't special! I-I was b-boring..." he wiped his tears away, only for more to take their place. "They easily forgot about me and moved on to some other kid!"

As horrifying as that was, Rantaro listened and let him finish the story.

"The kid's parents told the cops and got my parents arrested. I hated him for that then, b-but he did the right thing. I-I didn't want them to hurt me anymore, I wanted them to love me! But I g-guess who I thought they were was a lie... I-I was born of two big fat liars!"

That did explain a lot... Why Kokichi hated liars despite being one himself, why he didn't want to be seen as boring, why he didn't try to get close to people, his time at the mental hospital, and why he wanted a big brother figure to protect him.

"When we get out of here, I'm going to go to that prison and beat them up." Rantaro swore.

"Really...?" Kokichi wiped his tears away. "B-big bro cares about me that much...?"

Truth be told, he didn't think Rantaro would believe someone like himself.

"I do." He held the boy close. He was a professional big brother after all. And if some bastard hurt a single one of his little sisters, he'd feel the same way.

"Love you, big bro..." Kokichi muttered, and then he drifted off into dream-world.

...

Rantaro caught up with the others, who were waiting by a cave wall. He held Kokichi in his arms. Poor guy was all tuckered out.

"Good, you saved him. And now on to save Makoto!" Shuichi said.

Rantaro couldn't help think about Kokichi and what he'd confided to him. To have gone through all that, and still conduct himself with charisma and confidence... Putting on a fake smile... Being okay with being hated so long as others didn't get hurt... The boy was a mystery, but now that all the pieces were coming together, Rantaro thought he liked Kokichi. He did care deep down, and deep deep down he wanted others to care for him. He just didn't want to get hurt anymore.

Brushing the boy's bangs out of his eyes, Rantaro kissed Kokichi on the forehead.

"I'll protect you from now on, little bro. You can count on it."

Rantaro noticed the others were speaking, thinking of a plan to escape the caves and find Makoto, so he listened.

Once they all knew what to do, they marched onwards through the darkness.
111311321123121.title: Kokichi feels he's about to faint, when...

choices: He wears the boots
He doesn't wear the boots
1113113211231211.content:
Shining his high beams into the darkness, Kiibo found the path that led out of the caves. With each step, everyone got closer and closer to freedom. But before they could take a step outside, a pink creature flew in front of them and screeched!

It was a fluffy pink Pterodactyl! Not as ugly as Kiibo thought an ancient creature should be. Other than the obnoxious shade of pink, this one looked rather youthful. The top of its head looked less pink and more blonde. It had piercing blue-green eyes.

"This creature looks kind of familiar!" Shuichi said. Kokichi nodded.

"Reminds me a little of someone we know."

There was a screech, and the boys backed away. Was the creature dangerous...? It seemed that way! They were going to need to think of a plan, and fast! While the other boys were deep in thought, Kokichi pulled himself out of Rantaro's arms. He started walking toward the creature. Rantaro started to move to pull him back, but Kokichi spoke.

"It's alright, I know what I'm doing!"

He walked up to the creature and grinned. She gave him a confused look. He put one hand on his hip and the other hand brought a finger to his lips. Putting on his innocent, clueless persona, he tipped his head to the side.

"Oh, Miu, I didn't know you wanted to be a bird! I mean, I knew you were a bird-brain, but..."

She screeched and dove towards him. But before she could do anything, she fell to the ground. The other boys almost did a double take with how fast it happened. Kokichi had made his move. The Miu-dactyl was getting her belly rubbed, and was chirping excitedly.

"I had a hunch this would work as soon as I figured out who it was!"

The other boys nodded, dumbfounded.

Making their way to the exit, they were stopped in their tracks. Before them stood Makoto, dead eyed.

"Ha! Mmmm..." Miu said, trying to ignore the belly rubs. "You have to... mmm... get past him if you... ahhhh... want to get out! And I t-trained him not to show any m-mercy!"

Makoto had his arms raised in a battle pose. Everyone gasped.

"What did you do to him?!" Shuichi asked.

"Brainwashed." Rantaro said, simply. "Kokichi told me."

"Well we're just going to have to un-brainwash him!"

He charged for the exit but Makoto saw and grabbed him, throwing him to the back of the cave wall.

"You can't do that!" Kokichi said. "Someone's going to need to distract him while someone else makes a break for it. Trust me, I saw a couple movies like that!"

Shuichi got up and looked to the others. Hesitantly, they nodded. "Okay. But who's going to be the bait?"

"I say we put it to a vote!" Kokichi grinned. With the dirty looks he got from the others, it was clear they were going to vote for him. Rantaro simply couldn't let that happen.

"Wait! I-I'll do it..."

"Rantaro... You'll be the bait?" Kokichi said seriously. The boy nodded. Kokichi waited a second, and then shuffled around in his inventory, finding a pair of black calf-high boots. "Put these on. They'll protect your feet in case Makoto decides to fight dirty!"

He hesitated. Kokichi was giving him a gift that could benefit him? It seemed too good to be true. But then again, Kokichi had been nicer to him recently. Should he accept the boy's gift?

"Come on, you still don't trust me, big bro...? I wouldn't give this gift to anyone else in case you're wondering. Now hurry up! Put them on or you won't be protected!"

It could be a trap that gives him a worse torture than Makoto ever could. Or, Kokichi could be telling the truth and it would protect him from the ordeal. What should Rantaro do...?
1113113211231211.title: Kiibo finds the exit! But what's that pink ...

choices: Epilogue: Rantaro and Kokichi
11131132112312111.content:
Rantaro paused to think, running a hand through his straight blond hair with a green tint. It felt like everything hinged on this plan working out. He wanted to make the right decision, or else he'd be in deep trouble. Finally, he took a deep breath and a leap of faith.

"Alright, Kokichi. I'll trust you." Rantaro could have sworn he saw the boy's eyes brighten for a second.

Kokichi grinned as Rantaro slipped the boots on. As soon as they were on, they tightened around his feet. Panicking, Rantaro tried to slip them off, but found he couldn't. They were stuck.

"Ahhhh! What's happened? Kokichi!"

"Don't sweat it, big bro! That's just the boots' mechanism for keeping your feet safe! Makoto won't be able to remove them!"

"I can't even remove them!"

"Exactly! You're 100% safe for the rest of the game!" Kokichi's happy demeanor changed and he started to whine. "Now come on and fight him already.."

Rantaro took a deep breath, filling his lungs with dank cave air. He was scared. He could do this. Don't panic, he reminded himself, just go! Stepping up to Makoto, he got ready to show off some martial arts skills. Makoto stood there dead eyed, but lifted his arms in preparation to fight. It was easy to block his attacks at first, but being worn down after the first minute did a number on his reflexes. Rantaro got tired, but Makoto was strong as ever. Despite this, Rantaro kept going. Makoto tried to fight dirty at one point, but he couldn't take the boots off, like Kokichi said.

'Ha!' Rantaro thought. 'Checkmate!'

He went for Makoto's underarms, tickling him effectively. The boy faltered, but didn't laugh. The others, minus Kokichi, seeing that they had a clear path, bolted for the exit. All of them made it successfully. Kokichi stayed with the Miu-dactyl, still rubbing her belly. It looked as though she was satisfied. But then things took a turn for the worse. Makoto grabbed Rantaro around the waist and tickled him there, turning the tables, making Rantaro struggle all while giggling up a storm.

"MaahahaahhaaAAKOHOHOHOHOHTOOO!! STAHAAHAHAHAHAA- R-AAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA REMEMBER WH-WHO Y-YOU WERE BEFORE!! PAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAHAHA! PLEEEEHEEEHEHEHEHEHHEHEASE! YOU CAN DOHOHOHOHOHOHO IT!!"

Makoto's eyes remained blank. He continued following orders, going through the motions he was commanded to. It looked like Rantaro was doomed. Meanwhile, Kokichi got distracted by watching Rantaro and forgot to continue the belly rubs. Miu screeched and snapped at him. In fear, the boy doubled back, letting out a terrified shriek.

"Kokichi!" Fearing his little brother was in danger, Rantaro summoned his hidden power and executed a perfect uppercut to Makoto's jaw, knocking him out. He ran over to find Miu standing over Kokichi, the boy faltering, probably afraid of her sharp beak. Miu grinned evilly.

"You know what we're going to do to you, little traitor?! When I take you back through the caves, you're going to face your own brutal brainwashing experience! A-ha-ha! And I think we might even bring in two special guests, a man and a woman. You might know these fuckers. They look so much like you! Maybe they're in prison now, but bringing them into virtual reality would be no problem at all!"

"Please, no!" He noticeably trembled. It took all he had to prevent himself from having a panic attack. He backed up against a wall... Closing his eyes, he prepared to fight or die trying. Nothing happened. Instead there was some yelling and screeching, the sound of wings flapping off, and then Rantaro's calming voice.

"It's okay." Opening his eyes, Kokichi saw Rantaro standing over him, hand outstretched. Putting a hand to his face, Kokichi realized there were tears running down his cheeks. He took Rantaro's hand and let the boy help him up. "I'm here... I won't let anyone hurt you."

Kokichi wrapped Rantaro in a tight hug, crying uncontrollably into his vestments. After a few minutes, he calmed and could breathe normally again. All the while Rantaro held him and didn't say a word.

Once Kokichi felt safe again, the two decided on what to do with Makoto. They decided to both carry him from one end, and bring him out of the caves. Whatever awaited them on the other side, they were ready.

...

There was a bright light, and then darkness. Their eyes adjusted, and they noticed a "Congratulations, you win!" screen with a happy face and virtual fireworks going off. Then they woke up in the virtual pods they were placed in at the beginning.

"Huh. We did it. We actually beat the game!" Rantaro cheered. Everyone clapped and congratulated themselves. They helped Rantaro out of his pod. Then he helped Kokichi out of his. Curious as to what had happened while he was still in the game, Rantaro inquired about it. So they told him.

Junko was the mastermind of this whole operation. After escaping the game, Shuichi with the help of Kyoko had discovered her location, and reported it to the cops. His own father ended up arresting her. She'd brainwashed Chihiro first, and ordered him to write the virtual world code so she could use it to ensnare Ultimates and turn them into slaves. With no Ultimates around to stop her, she'd be free to rule the world as she pleased. And besides, doesn't it just fill you with despair to be tickled until you lose your mind...? It would be a win-win situation for her.

Kyoko helped Makoto out of his pod, noticing he was still dead-eyed. She held him in her arms. She wished she could have been there and saved him before things got this far. Kokichi offered up a solution. But nobody wanted to listen to someone like him. So Kokichi whispered his idea in Rantaro's ear. Rantaro said, "Hey, I have an idea!"

Doing what Kokichi said, he took a golden pocket watch and swung it back and forth in front of Makoto's eyes.

"You are getting very sleepy... Your eyelids are getting very heavy... Okay. Now, when I snap my fingers, you're going to remember who you were and regain all your memories from before your torture."

He snapped his fingers. Makoto woke with a start.

"Guys? Where am I; what's going on...?" He was more confused when everyone started cheering. They said they'd explain it all to him later. They were just too happy right now.

After Rantaro brought Makoto back to normal, he wondered if he could bring Chihiro and Miu back as well. Surely it was worth a shot. It wasn't long before the other two were de-brainwashed as well. Everyone rejoiced and hugged.
11131132112312111.title: He wears the boots

111311321123121111.content:
It was a bright morning. Kokichi was on a white modern-day ship with Rantaro. They were about to set sail on an adventure mission to help find Rantaro's long lost sister! Kokichi had brought old timey maps and adventure gear, which he kept in his backpack. Each boy wore a white t-shirt along with swim trunks and sandals. Rantaro's swimsuit had green and blue waves, while Kokichi's had yellow and orange ones.

"So little brother, before we set sail, I have a few questions for you. And you'd better answer honestly or the tickle snake's gonna get you!" He put his hand in a position to make it look somewhat like a snake's mouth, opening and closing it 'threateningly'. Kokichi 'eep!'d and Rantaro chuckled. "First question: What's your backstory with DICE? Who even are they...?"

Kokichi giggled at the thought of the snake. Then he became serious, letting the memories flow back.

"They're my true family, unlike those traitors I lived with for 11 years... And it's funny... after my parents hurt me, and I was sent to a mental hospital, I didn't think I'd trust anyone ever again. I was hurting really badly... I self-harmed on a daily basis. Everything seemed to go in a downward spiral. I hated myself, and thought I was weak, pathetic, and disgusting. I didn't think someone like me deserved friends. The doctors worried that I wasn't going to make it... That's when nurse Mikan came in. She talked to me while I was in that mental state and became my first friend. At first I was defensive, wondering why anyone would want to be my friend after what happened. Repeating what her own doctor had told her, she said it wasn't my fault. I wanted to believe her, but I couldn't just yet. She also had problems with her self-esteem that her doctor was helping her with. And she urged me to reach out to people. I don't think I'd have made it this far, if not for her.

"My second friend was maid Kirumi. I met her while she was vacuuming the facility. She's really nice and kind, like a real mom should be. Over time, my mental state improved, and I learned to smile again. I still think of her as my true mom.

"Then I met a group of people at the lunchroom table. They seemed kind of like outcasts and misfits, and they all wore sad frowns. It bothered me that whenever I saw them, they never smiled. That's when I decided that my duty would be to make these people smile! I reached out to them. And let me tell you, that was the best decision of my life! Thanks to my leadership skills, those misfits and I banded together to create hilarious pranks and jokes to entertain ourselves and others! And the more time I spent with them, the less sad I was, too. I stopped self-harming. I told my psychiatrist about them, and he agreed it was a good idea to be friends with them. One day, I confided in them what my parents had done. I expected them to be disgusted with me and push me away, but they understood and comforted me. Everything hurt, but they told me it wasn't my fault. And the more they said it, the more I wanted to believe them. For the first time, I felt sure the love they had for me wasn't a lie. And that was the moment that I knew they were my true family.

You know I'd do anything for them, right? Well, Junko manipulated me. She told me she'd captured them and would hurt them unless I played her stupid virtual game. Ugh, it was so boring! ...Until I met you. Getting to tickle you was the only good part, heh. After Junko was arrested, Kyoko and Shuichi found them locked in a cage. They were all okay, thank goodness."

Rantaro patted his back. They stayed in silence a while, the splash of the waves against the boat and the caw of seagulls were the only sounds they heard.

"Anyways..." Kokichi continued. "DICE and I all live together under one roof now. And no, it's not at the asylum. The oldest of my crew bought a house and adopted all of us legally! We call our place "DICE headquarters." And hey, you're always welcome for a visit!"

"Kokichi... that's really sweet. I'd love to. But there's one other thing I don't understand. If you're really nice deep down, why did you act so rude when we first met...?"

"I guess that had to do with bullies... When I went back to public school, 90% of the students would purposefully try and trigger me, or laugh when someone did, and it just went to show that 'sane' people could be the cruellest of all. That's why I didn't know if I could trust you..."

"Kokichi..." he reached out to the boy, who leaped into his arms, wrapping his arms and legs around him like a monkey. Rantaro lightly hugged him back. The boy made a satisfied cat-like sound. Kokichi looked up at Rantaro with a smile.

"But now that I know you're nice, I don't have to worry anymore! Cause I know you'll protect me from bullies and stand up for me!"

"Of course," Rantaro said. He may not like confrontations, but he knew if anyone tried to hurt his precious brother, they'd be sorry.

"Love ya, big bro!"

"I love you too, Kokichi."

They stayed in silence a while, alone with their thoughts. Kokichi climbed down off of Rantaro, deciding instead to lounge in a folding chair. He made some raspberry lemonade for both himself and Rantaro, and poured two glasses full. Slipping on some sunglasses, Kokichi inserted a straw into the drink and took a sip. Rantaro sat beside him and took the other glass, helping himself, not even bothering with a straw. Idly, Kokichi thought of his other friends and came up with a new pun.

"You know... I wish our other friends from the Sim could join us... Then I could help myself to some Nagi-toes!" He flashed a big grin. Rantaro rolled his eyes. "Nee-hee-hee!"

"That's it, you're going to get it!" Rantaro showed Kokichi the 'tickle snake' clearly so he knew what was to come. Then it attacked! Hysterical, childlike laughter filled the air! Kokichi squirmed and struggled, pushing the snake away from one spot on his torso only to have it attack another.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA! HAHAHAHAHAAHAAAHAAHAHAAHAHAA!! MERCY!! HAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAAA! MERCEEEHEHEHEEHEE!!"

Rantaro slowed down, then finally let up. Kokichi was a panting, blushing mess. He wrapped his arms around his stomach to prevent another surprise attack.

"You good?" Rantaro asked. The boy let out a few more after giggles, and nodded. "Good. Then let's set off on our adventure!"

"Yes, let's!"

And so the boys left the dock and set sail. They were prepared for a whole other adventure, which, knowing them, was sure to be filled with lots of tickles and mischief. And if they were successful, would reunite Rantaro with his treasured sister.
111311321123121111.title: Epilogue: Rantaro and Kokichi

11131132112312112.content:
"Sorry, Kokichi. I don't quite trust you yet, so I'm going to have to refuse. Nothing personal."

For a split second, Kokichi looked sad. But that quickly melted away into an evil grin. He started to laugh maniacally.

"A-HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA!" He wiped tears away from his eyes and continued. "You're right to refuse the gift! After all, I'm the Supreme Leader of Evil! Why should you trust someone like me?!" His grin turned into a more subtle, sly one. "You know... I was planning on using those shoes to tickle you senseless! They have a special mechanism installed inside them! All I have to do is activate it with my remote!"

"Kokichi!" Everyone glared at him. Rantaro, deciding he'd made the right decision, moved forward. He did better than Shuichi, actually dodging the first few blows. Makoto fought with him for a while. After a minute, he became tired, and barely dodged the boy's attacks. Then Makoto grabbed him by the foot. It was all over for him when Makoto took off his shoe and started gliding his finger along his sole.

"NAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAAA!" Rantaro struggled, but it was useless. He had him in a vice-grip.

As much as the others didn't want to leave him, they knew they had to in order to beat the game. Nagito took over for Kokichi providing the Miu-dactyl belly rubs because he knew the right way to lul a pet to sleep with them. He only had to do the motions for about 30 seconds before she fell asleep.

It was a torturous 30 seconds for Rantaro, who almost went insane with how much Makoto tickled him. His poor feet couldn't handle it!

"AAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAA! AHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAHAHAHAA! HAHAHAHAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAAA!"

Everyone else dashed for the exit. Kokichi spared a pitiful look back at Rantaro, before he disappeared into the white light to freedom with the others.

Rantaro still couldn't escape. He was stuck laughing hysterically for as long as Makoto still had energy. And that was a lot of energy.

Fighting back proved fruitless. And Rantaro tried to reach out to him and make him remember who he once was, but he couldn't get a single word out through his laughter. He felt so helpless!

It seemed like forever, but finally Rantaro got some relief when he saw a bright light, and then fell into darkness. He saw words on a screen. All they said were "Kyoko.exe."

What a weird dream...

Rantaro woke up on the floor in Chihiro's room. It was half-lit, the brightness of the computer monitor shining through the darkness. Chihiro was tied up in a corner. Everyone else who'd been trapped in the game stood before him, as well as Kyoko. Rantaro's soles still tingled, and he was exhausted, but was happy it was finally over.

"Kyoko... you saved me...?"

She nodded. "Yes. I wrote that program to help you and Makoto escape. Looks like it worked." Solemnly, she looked to Makoto, who was still dead-eyed.

"Do you think there's any way to bring him back...?"

"I hope so." Kyoko hugged Makoto tight. "I hate seeing him like this..."

Kokichi stood there with a golden pocket watch. "I have an idea. It may be a long shot, but..."

...

The others watched as Kokichi swung the pocket watch back and forth.

"You are getting very sleepy... Your eyelids are getting heavier... You can hardly keep them open anymore... Okay. Now, when I snap my fingers, you will awaken. And you will regain all your memories and personality from before you were tortured. Okay? Now!" He snapped his fingers. Makoto awoke with a start.

"Kyoko?! Guys? W-what happened...?"

In response, Kyoko hugged him. Everyone started talking at once. They had to wait a few minutes to calm down and explain so Makoto could understand. In the end, he was sad to hear what happened to him, but happy that everyone escaped the program. He hugged everyone, tears running down his cheeks. Apparently Junko, the mastermind behind everything, had been arrested while Makoto and Rantaro were still in the game. She'd brainwashed Chihiro a few months ago, which caused him to become evil. Kokichi then walked over to Chihiro, ready to de-brainwash him next with his pocket watch trick. Rantaro smiled, but he was too out of energy to stay awake. He fell back onto the floor, a shag carpet the only thing to break his fall.

When Rantaro awoke, he was in bed, a blanket covering him. Kokichi hovered over him with a creepy grin. Reacting on instinct, he pushed him away with a scream.

"Woah, woah, woah! I won't hurt you!" Kokichi said, brushing his loose black bangs out of his eyes.

"You sure about that?!"

"Nee-hee-hee! Since you don't trust me, I've decided to legally adopt you as my big brother until you do!" he showed him the adoption papers. Rantaro did a double take, as everything looked legit.

"N-no way!" Kokichi grinned.

"Of course!" Suddenly Kokichi became serious. "Because if you can't trust me after I've told you a devastating truth about my life, you'll never have any real friends. Look..." He showed him some program files. Included were the black calf-high boots from the game. They listed 'full foot protection' as part of their perks. Their only downside was that you couldn't take them off for the rest of the game. No evil tickly mechanism or remote were listed.

"Wh- But you said!"

"That was a lie! I didn't want to make you feel bad after making the wrong decision!" He shook his head pitifully. Then he smirked. "But you know... it was quite funny seeing you laugh your head off like that! Nee-hee-hee!"

"Kokichi!" Rantaro jumped on him, fingers ready.

"Oh no! No, no, no, no, no!" Kokichi burst into laughter as his stomach was assaulted with tickles. "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAAAHAAA!" Rantaro laughed along with him. Maybe having Kokichi as his little brother wouldn't be so bad!

Pros of having Kokichi as your little brother: cuddles and tickles whenever you want!
Cons of having Kokichi as your little brother: creepy smiles at 4 a.m., and invasions of your personal space!

Ah well. He's too cute to stay mad at!

"HEHEHEHEEHHEHEHEHEHEEHEHHEHEEE! PLEHEHEHEHEHEHHEHEHEHEASE! NOHOHOHOHOHOOHO!! STAHHAHHAAHHAAHAHAAHP! I'M SAHHAHAHAHAHHAAHORRY!!"

Rantaro eased up on him, slowing down and eventually stopping. Kokichi panted, after-giggles littering in between.

"What are you doing! *gasp* *pant* Free me, quick before she comes back!"

Just then, the sound of the Cat-taur's footsteps echoed throughout the cave. Rantaro slipped into a position where he looked like he was still in his straitjacket. The woman was carrying some paintbrushes and a feather duster. This could be a problem. Scratch that. It was a huge problem! How would they get out of this now?

Both boys laughter grew hysterical as soon as the Cat-taur applied her tools to their feet.

"NAHHAHAHHAHAAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHHHAHAHAHAHHHAAHHAAHAA!"

...

Keebo lost it. He just lost it, uncontrollable laughter filled the room. He wished he was just a little less ticklish, then he could at least talk or beg for mercy. They were doomed, weren't they? Everyone had been captured, faced with being tortured for the rest of their life. He was sure, even as a robot, he could laugh himself to death. Was there no hope for them? Could nobody save them...? Was despair their one and only fate...?

He could feel his laughter growing fainter and fainter.

Just when he thought he was on the brink of death, the tickling stopped. He saw a multitude of stars and gathered his breath. Then the stars faded. Instead, he was faced with a blackscreen. White letters scrawled across it. He read the program name, trying to make sense of it.

All it said was: "Kaede.exe."

In Chihiro's room, Kaede put her hands on her hips.

"Chihiro, I've made my decision! Let my friends go!"

He put his hands on his hips, looking up defiantly.

"Make me!"

Famous last words. She put her hands on his sides and...

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAAA! AHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAA!!"

After a few minutes, the boy was wheezing and pleading with her.

"Hahahaahhahaa! Ahh-Alrihihihiihihiight! *gasp* I-I'll doohoooohohooo it! Just stahhahahahhaahhahp!!"

...

Makoto felt like he was in a hazy, dream like state.

And then, he was free. Something brought his memory back to him and put him back in the present. He was wearing a pink sweater for some reason, with long black pants.

He looked around and realized his surroundings were pitch black. There was something written on a screen.

"Kaede.exe"

Huh? Kaede? Wasn't that the name of Shuichi's girlfriend...?

Before he could think of anything else, he was pulled back into the real world. He was in a semi-lit room with a computer and chair in the corner. The others were there with him.

"G-guys...? Is it really you?"

The others smiled at him tiredly and nodded. He pulled them all into a group hug. Then they realized they were standing in the same room as Kaede and Chihiro. Kaede was sitting by the computer, a triumphant look on her face.

"Kaede, you rescued us?"

She nodded.

"Of course! I couldn't let him get away with that. It's a good thing my fingers are so nimble from playing the piano!"

They all nodded in agreement, figuring out what must have happened.

Makoto thought for a while over what Chihiro's punishment should be. He didn't want to do anything to inflict pain, or make him feel nearly as uncomfortable as he'd made him feel. (Chihiro had certainly gone too far with that.) The best option, if he had indeed been corrupted by the teachings of Junko, would be to re-educate him. That would be the most compassionate route.

The others didn't seem to share his sentiment though, as they'd pinned down and started tickling Chihiro all over as revenge.

'Oh well.' Makoto thought, half-smiling. 'I guess we'll do the re-education thing after they've had their fun... After all, what goes around comes around.'

111311321311.content:
Kaede and Shuichi went for a walk at night, the full moon shining down upon them. They took a path with lots of trees with minimal city lights.

"Thanks for rescuing me, Kaede. I thought I was doomed."

She smiled. "No problem! I'm sure you'd do the same for me."

He nodded. He shuddered to think of her in a situation like that, but he knew he'd do everything he could to rescue her if it came down to it.

They stayed close for a while. Kaede had interlocked her arm with his. Just feeling his heartbeat and knowing he was safe was enough to fill her with hope.

Accidentally, she brushed his side, making him flinch and suppress a giggle.

"Oh! I'm sorry!"

He smiled awkwardly.

"No, no! It's fine. Actually, it feels good coming from you."

She smiled back.

"Oh. I'm glad..." Resting her head on his shoulder, she felt a satisfying joy bloom in her heart. She'd happily tickle her boyfriend in the future, knowing he'd enjoy it. And this new revelation of his made her love him even more.
