"Hahaggha! Stohop that! Gihihve me a breaheek!".

The goblin didn't stop though, to the contrary he started to tickle him even harder! (Shuichi +4 Libido) That goblin definitely LOVED what he was doing to this beautiful boy's beautiful feet!
"I can't even focus! I need to think of a strategy...but this feels...good? No...what am I thinking?". Just like Makoto earlier, Shuichi's mind started to betray him under the games influence.

Meanwhile Rantaro also had problems. He was stronger than Shuichi but he had two opponents and now they were licking his feet (Rantaro +4 Libido). The goblins loved to lick his soles as they held them tight. It tickled so bad that all Rantaro could do was cover his own mouth to try and keep the laughter contained. The goblin tongues tickled so much...but somewhat he started to appreciate that feeling though. "It feels kind of good...Huh?! What am I thinking?! I've gotta get loose!".
Soon his gorgeous feet were covered in drool from the slobbering monsters, Everytime Rantaro tried to reach and stop them they'd give his feet another long and slow lick breaking him back down into a helpless giggly mess.


Things were even worse for Nagito. The mage couldn't move his arms or legs and was gagged on top of that.The goblins continued to furiously tickle his feet! One of them was directly tickling his soles, while the other did something different. It sawed a feather in between each of his toes! (Nagito +4 Libido x2).
It tickled so bad at the same time it felt really good to him. Nagito started to relax and feel happy under the goblins care despite himself. In fact if it wasn't for the gag, anybody could tell he was happy just by seeing the look on his face. He'd changed his mind and wished he wasn't gagged. He wanted his captors to enjoy his laughter so they'd tickle him harder!
"Yes, tickle my feet even more! Feels sooo good...I wish I could laugh for them forever...wait why am I thinking this? I don't want this!'

Even if things were extremely bad for Makoto who'd had to face a whole squad of goblins One of his skills would save the rest of the group. Before his torturers could take him wherever they'd planned to, A little marble fell out of his pocket and exploded into very powerful light. The goblins screeched in surprise as they were blinded by the powerful flash.They recoiled and stumbled about in confusion due to the explosive. The boys realized this was the break they'd needed to escape the monsters and fled, leaving behind the items the goblins had taken from them.






They ran until they were in another part of the dungeon. A dark corridor with plenty of doors stretched before them. Shuichi investigated until finding one of the doors on their left with a banner that read "LIBRARY" above it. He called it out to the others.
"Everyone, it seems there's a library on our left, I suggest we go inside. It's a calm place and we should probably get out of the hall in case those monsters try to follow us."

"I don't think we're gonna get that lucky again so we should probably avoid them."

"I lost my sword and boot's against those two so I'm gonna have to agree with Makoto here. We should hide."

"I lost my shoes and sword too Rantaro. It's best if we all rest in here and take inventory while I come up with a plan"

Shuichi felt a hand on his shoulder and turned to see the oldest of the four teens, Nagito still trying to undo the leather strap gagging him.
"Mmpghhhh...mphhhhh...MMMPHHHHHHHH!!!"

"Oh Nagito what happened?! Let me help you remove that thing!"

A few seconds later after some effort from Shuichi and Rantaro, Nagito was finally able to speak.

"Thank you so much! What was that light though? It saved me otherwise I'd still be caught"

"I think that was mine. Some kind of flash bomb that the goblins didn't take from me when they took all my other items plus my shoes."

The boys opened the door and noticed there was a kind of force field as well as a sign near them

"Rules of the library:
Rule number 1) it is forbidden to wear shoes and socks in the library. The forcefield will continue to block persons who still have shoes and socks. Also once inside you must NEVER put them on again or you'll face consequences!
Rule number 2) You must whisper while you're inside. If you make too much noise you'll get a warning and if that happens again you will be punished!
Rule number 3) You can read all books you want inside the library but you do not steal anything otherwise you will be punished!"

The boys were surprised they had to remove their shoes and socks to enter but since the goblins had all of their shoes and socks it didn't seem to matter.
Once inside they noticed the size of the well lit room . It seemed a lot more welcoming than the dark corridor. They each took a seat and as they did that, a voice explained rules earlier spoke in their head directly:

Congratulations on surviving your first battle and reaching safety! Since you ran away you gainnothing. Defeating enemies will give you xp and gold to allow you to grow stronger and buy stuff. Don't forget to check your skills as well as the enemy guide now that you entered your first enemies

"What? There's an enemy guide?" wondered Shuichi

"It probably appeared once we encountered goblins." suggested Rantaro

"I think we whould check our skills first." suggested Shuichi.


Shuichi checked his

Barbarian: lv 1 skill ... passive skill: Enormous Damage. Can inflict 2 more damage melee, this does not affect range attacks. Other skill..Pierce Armor: once every 20 minutes you can use this skill to ignore the opponent's armor

Rantaro's read as

Adventurer: lv 1 skill...Double Shot: once every 15 minutes you can shoot two arrows at the same time (note: the number of arrows in your quiver is the same as Legolas that is to say unlimited), other lv 1 skill...Falcon Slash...once every 10 minutes you can attack twice in a row with your sword

It was then Nagito's turn

Mage: lv 1 skill ... Fire...cost 2 MP but inflicts 3 fire magical damages (ignores physical armor) ... lv 1 skill...Ice...cost 2 MP but inflicts 3 ice magical damages (ignores physical armor)

Finally, it was Makoto's turn

Thief: lv 1 skill ... Dagger Frenzy...once every 10 minutes you can attack three times in a row with your dagger (keep in mind daggers are quite weak weapons)...passive skill...Treasure Hunter...you can "smell" when chest is around...passive skill: Trapped Treasure? you have 75% of chances to be right when you guess a chest is trapped or not. Passive skill: when in a critical situation you'll automatically throw a flash bomb (can only be used once each 3 hour). Final lv 1 skill "I Need Some Money!": thanks to you, your group will gain 1.5 times more money by defeating enemies or in chests.


The voice continued

The barbarian level 2 will have a skill that allows him to throw two small hatchets, the level 2 adventurer will be able to shoot fire arrows, the level 2 mage will have access to a wind spell, the level 2 thief will have improved chances to gain items from defeated enemies and will be able to craft things out of all sorts of items.

"So basically if we use our abilities we might have a chance to get out." Shuichi said

"I'm not sure those monsters were strong!" Makoto added

"Talking about monsters we should check out the enemy guide" Rantaro suggested

Enemy guide ... monster encountered ... 1/100,000. Monster: Goblin of Depths... Strengths: Is individually stronger, faster, more agile and pretty much better at everything than you! In addition to that, Goblins of Depths are often looking for victims in groups.

Goblins of Depths love to tickle their preys' feet using their fingers, tongues or tools such as feathers. It is not recommended to anger them, otherwise they will force you to lick their feet, suck on their toes, suck their heels etc ... unless this is what you're looking for: to be a footslave to goblins and be dominated by them and their green feet!

The group was surprised the voice was talking to them like that. (Nagito +2 Libido) Some were even slightly excited by this (shuichi +4 Libido points), However others disliked verbal domination. (Rantaro and Makoto +1 Libido).

That being said all of them thought it would be hot to piss some goblins off to lick their goblin feet (Shuichi, Rantaro and Nagito +4 Libido points), except Naegi who was disgusted by the idea but yet couldn't stop imagining it. (Naegi +1 Libido).
But they were soon taken ouf of their fantasies with one question in head ... what will they do?


[since the group is resting they recover some HP, MP and will lose 2 Libido points]

Rantaro
HP 100
MP 100
Libido 21

Nagito
HP 100
MP 100
Libido 20

Makoto
HP 95
MP 100
Libido 24

Shuichi
HP 97
MP 100
Libido 30

All four have reached level 1 of libido (slightly excited), And they'll reach level 2 of libido (excited) once they'll have 38 points.
Poated on behalf of user Manju
11512.title: They're somehow able to run away

choices: She thought she did? Instead Kokichi is waiting atop some kind of device...
Hiyoko has found him and she's tormenting him with more of that Itching Powder.
Miss Chisa is lecturing him for being barefoot. It seems he'll be punished.
Are these some of Gonta's bug's in the hallway? How careless of that boy.
I've heard rumors Komaeda is looking for him. That is never a good thing.
12.content:
It was another day for Makoto Naegi as a student of Hope's Peak. He'd been going to the elite academy for almost a year and still had trouble believing that it was real. He kept thinking any day they'd realize he was nothing special and not let him in but once again as he passed the glowering Mr. Sakakura at the gate he was let in. He walked down the hallways checking each room as he looked for his friends Byakuya and Kyoko. The Luckster was once again marveled at how in middle school he got pantsed once a month but now as high schooler he was looking for his best friends the richest boy in the country and one of the top detectives in the world.

His family was even benefiting at this point from his enrollment in the academy. His mother and father had both been employed by one the former graduates and his little sister had formed an odd friendship with one of his gloomier classmates somehow. Now Toko was around the house and Komaru almost constantly. Makoto was so focused on recounting these events in his head that he still barely noticed when he seemingly ran into brick wall. The short teen fell down on his butt embarrassed at his own stupidity when the wall turned around he realized it was his classmate!

''Makoto you need to watch where you're going. There are far more unfriendly people than I roaming these halls.'' rumbled the deep voice of Sakura Oogami the Ultimate Martial Artist as she chided Naegi. ''Sorry Sakura. I was distracted and wasn't looking where I was going. It's an hon-honest mistake.''

Naegi couldn't help himself when he stuttered. He'd known the larger girl for more than a year and had first hand experience on how kind and gentle she was. Still when she was glowering down at him like this he still stuttered in fear before her causing her expression to darken.

''I see, My apologies Naegi I did not mean to frighten you.''
''Sa-Sakura no I'm sorry!''
''Allow me to help you up at least. To apologize for giving you such a fright.''
''N-No Sakura it wasn't you-''
''Allow me to help you up Naegi.''
Sakura picked him up bodily and was surprised as the small hoodie clad teen burst into giggles in her hands. He pulled away from her and braced himself on the wall.
''Ma-Makoto?'' she asked in surprise.
''Ihihit's nothing!'' the still snickering Luck said as he pulled away from her thinking about how her large rough fingers had just run up his spine and cursing that just had been enough to to get gim giggling and red in the face. Makoto took off down the hallway quickly leaving the surprised grappler in his wake. All Sakura could think was how pleasant his laugh was.




Later in the day Sakura was on her way to the Nurse's office in search of protein powder when she heard Makoto laughing again. She peeked into a class room and saw the boy on the ground once more kicking and pulling at his shoes. He was frantically giggling as he pulled at his own shoes and rolled on the ground. He spied the shocked Fighter and held his hand out to her begging through his giggles.

''Sahehekura hehelp pleeheese!~''
''Mak-Makoto what is wrong!?''
''Maheehee Myheeeheehaa''
''Makoto what ails you my friend?!''
''Shaahee shoohohes!''
''Your shoes?! Is that what you said Naegi?''
''Neehhahapleeashee''

With one one hand she grabbed his leg and held it still. She quickly undid the laces and pulled but found it not coming off her classmates foot. She paused not wanting to hurt the Ultimate Luck but as the boy banged his fists on ground she pushed forward. She pinched her fingers through the sole of Makoto's sneaker using the ''Mantis eats Tiny Bird'' technique before pulling the rubber sole of the shoe clean off and noticing right away...

1. The inside of Makoto's shoe was coated in some powder which quickly coated Sakura's fingers causing them to itch mightily.
2. The Ultimate Luck's feet were bare inside in his sneakers and at first Sakura was distracted by how small her friend and classmates feet were and not just for a boy. Still what had happened to the boy's socks she wondered? And where could she find them?
3. Naegi's feet were obviously distressed. His soles flushed a an appealing shade of pink and the toes flexed and unflexed rapidly in Sakura's hand-

''Sahahakura pleese?
''Ahh my apologies.''
Sakura quickly and easily ripped that sneaker and the other off Naegi but was confused as all this did was allow her classmate to scratch and paw at his now bared feet.
''Ihihitching pohohodwer! Hiyohohko put it in my shohoes and IT'S DRIHIVING ME CRAZY!! GEHEHET IT AHHHFF!!''

Makoto Naegi the Ultimate Luck scratched and scrubbed at his own feet on the ground like a child throwing a tantrum. He bent his own toes back and dragged his nails from itching spot to itching spot but all that seemed to do was make it worse for the boy who's face growing redder by the second. When his voice gave out Sakura finally snapped out of it and jumped into action.
''Shield your eyes I'll put an end to this.''
The Ultimate Martial Artist drew her hands back and adjusted before clapping her hands together and unleashing her special ''Jangu'' clap blowing the dust off her small friend's tortured feet out the window and onto one Hiyoko Saionji who was laughing in the courtyard at her perfect prank on the unlucky from the class below her. Makoto breathed easier at the clawing sensation having been removed. He sighed and rubbed at his face, wiping away the tears. Sakura placed her hand on his shoulder as he sniffed.

''Tha-Thank you so much Sakura. Saionji from the class above us snuck that stuff into my shoes when I wasn't looking.''
''What happened to your socks my friend?''
''She set up a bucket of water to ruin them when I came into the classroom.''
''M-Makoto may I tell you something?''
''Of course Sakura! You just saved me anything you want!''
''Ma-Makoto this may not be what you want to hear right now but...you have a very cute laugh.''
''Wh-What?''
''I don't mean to overstep but your laugh is very nice and if I may?''
''Su-Sure Sakura go ahead.''
''Your feet are quite...cute and remarkably small for a male. If I may I'd like to touch them please?''
''SAKURA NO! I mean they're still sens-I don't like..-NO! NO! DON'T!!''

Her fingers froze just short of touching cute feet and Makoto instead pulled his bare feet close to him while once again growing red.and crawling away from his savior even though he knew he was hurting the legendary fighter's feelings by treating her like some kind of monster.
''I just-I'm sorry Sakura..bu-but I do-I don't! I DON'T WANT THAT! I DON'T LIKE IT!''
''Naegi my friend I did not mean to-''
''It'-It's fine Sakura I'm sorry but I don't-It would..I don't like-''
''Makoto are you perhaps ticklish? There is no shame in a boy being ticklish my friend I was just admiring yo-''
''I'M NOT! I'M NOT TICKLISH AT ALL! BOY'S AREN'T TICKLISH SAKURA SOJUST DROP IT!''
''Mako-Naegi--''
''It's fine! It's fine Sakura I just don't-I've- I have to leave now!~''

The shorter and to Sakura's opinion better of the two Ultimate Luck's currently attending the academy stormed off in a huff leaving Sakura flabbergasted by her friends tantrum. It hurt deep down as she had considered Naegi a very close friend here at the academy and to have him snap at her in such a manner was very disheartening to her considering the difficulty she'd been having making friends among her classmates.
''AH'' she said looking over at the pile of shredded rubber and fabric. ''Naegi forgot his shoes.''

Later in the day once more again Sakura was roaming the halls. After having a frank discussion with her very close friend Aoi Asahina she'd received the advice that she should speak with Naegi again and apologize for frightening him. Though he was not just a teenage boy but an Ultimate at the prestigious school in the world he still had his faults. Aoi had let the martial artist know that one of those faults was that he felt useless and weak in the face of the other Ultimates. Most likely being carried by her and turned into a giggling puddle by a prank had not very good for Makoto's sense of self-worth. Considering the feelings of others was something that Sakura was embarrassed to have forgotten and she would apologize to him when she found him for her error.

Suddenly she heard Makoto Naeigi...
12.title: Makoto's strong friend.

choices: Sakura believes him and leaves. Kokichi takes his shoes off....
''Kokichi you are lying to me. What is really under that scarf?''
Miu comes back and chases Kokichi off. What will Sakura do?
121.content:
''Mmmpph''
''Nishishishi~ what's the matter? Do you not like this?''

Sakura's well trained ears heard the taunt and her head snapped to the source of the sound. She peeked into another unused classroom and found Kokichi Oma the Ultimate Supreme Leader instead of her friend like she'd hoped. He was seated atop some sort of strange throne that certainly befit one with his talent. However his trademark scarf was atop the arm and seemed to be concealing an object which he drummed his fingers atop as he evaluated her.

''Ohhh woow! Sakura right? From the class above me? Hii!~'' he said in his sing-songish tone that made Sakura feel like he was mocking her. It was not a new feeling to her.
''Greetings Kokichi my apologies I am looking for my classmate and thought I heard him in here for a second,''
''Huuuh? Who were you looking for cause I think I saw Byakuya go by a bit ago. He was heading down towards the gym I think I heard.''
''No the classmate I was looking looking for is-''
''Hmmppgh!''
Kokichi dug his nails into the scarf covered armrest which if Sakura had been paying attention to she would have seen that it quivered in response to the boy's fingers. This was because the scarf hid the trapped foot of Makoto Naegi the Ultimate Luck who was trapped inside the chair. Instead though Sakura focused on the strange noise that had drawn here unaware that her friend was in a predicament right before her.


''Mmmhemhmm!''
''Pardon me do you hear that?''
''Hmmm? Hear what? I don't hear anything.''
''To answer your question from before no I am looking for my friend Makoto.''
''Who's that?'' the mischevious boy asked adopting an inquisitive look. Absentmindedly he fiddled with the cloth pulling the toes of the trapped Makoto Naegi back and spider tickling the stretched skin.
''Makoto Naegi the Ultimate Luck? He is a member of my class surely you must have met him. The student body of our academy is not that large.''


Oma ignored her and instead focused on his toy under the cloth drawing numbers then feiging having to erase with his thumb
''One One Zero Threeeee''
''Kokichi are you paying attention to me?''
''SEVEN! HA-HA!''
''Mmmhmhmhf! Hmppfmm''!
''There it is again! Kokichi are you listening to me?''
''Oh! Sorry Sakura-chan I forgot you were here!''
''What? I am standing right in front of you how could you forget me?''
''Oh that was a lie.''
''A lie?''
''Yeah I do that alot.''
''What? Why would you do that?''
Kokichi focused on drawing letters on the concealed sole now and went back to barely paying attention to Sakura as he scribbled nonsense all over Naegi's foot under the scarf.
''Mmmgghmm!!''
''I do that all the time.''
''Why?''
''Because I'm a robot controlled by somebody else.''
''Th-That's nonsense and I refuse to believe it!''
''That's good because it was a lie.''
''Mmmskkra!''
''Kokichi what are you doing with that scarf AND WHY ARE YOU NOT ANSWERING MY QUESTIONS!''
''Jeez why are you noisy? I don't like and I see why Naegi didn't want me to tell you where he was going. Ooopsie!''
''Kokichi what are you doing there?''
''Me? Just practicing some sleight of hand that Himiko showed me.''
''I find that hard to believe.''
''That's good Ogre-mi. It was just another lie!''
''Hmmmppf!!'' Naegi whimpered from the back of the chair hoping the girl would realize that it was all lies!
''Do you know where Naegi went Oma?'' the Martial Artist said tersely. She had heard that hated nickname he thought that he had so cleverly snuck in.
''Ohh are you mad at me now Sakura-chan? I'm sorry I didn't mean to lie but Makoto asked me to!''
''What? You know where he went?''
''Hmmffmmnn!''
''What is that noise?''
''Huuh what noise? Anyway Makoto-chan was really scaaared.''
''Hmm of what?''
''YOU SILLY! He was all upset saying Kokichi please if Ogre-mi comes in here don't tell her I'm going to hide in the dorms! She's so scary and mean looking!''
''That-That does not sound like him.''
''Ohh really? Booo that was a lie but doesn't it sound like something that people say about you?''
''Mind your tongue Kokic-''
''So if it sounds like something people say about you and Makoto was running from you than are you so sure that it's not true?''
While taunting her Oma drew an I down Makoto's poor little foot making sure to dot it with a heart and twiddle the toes.

''Mmmghgf!!''
''You just said he never said that-''
''That was a lie jeez are all big people stupid? I thought it was just Gonta. He was scared of you and went to hide in his dorm. Can you blame him?''
''Naegi would never...We are friends...''
''Heeeeyy are you lying? I don't like it when OTHER people lie! Even if it's just to themselves!''

Makoto Naegi tried to shake his head back and forth from his hiding place in the back of the chair but couldn't due to the restraint's not only holding his head still but also keeping him gagged and the headset over his eye's so that all he could see was the image of a smiling Miu Iruma beckoning him into a hug. The Ultimate Luck of class 11-C begged and pleaded to whoever was listening for his friend Sakura to not believe Kokichi's lies. Not just because they were terrible but also because HE REALLY WANTED OUT OF THIS FUCKING CHAIR! SHIT PLEASE! SAKURA DON'T BELIEVE HIM!
Great now he was talking like the insane inventor.


*Earlier in the day!*


''HAHAHAHA OF COURSE I'M SURE IT WORKS!!''
''Reeeally Miu? Are you super-duuuper one hundred percent suuure? What if it breaks huuuh? Shuichi could get really hurt and then he'll never like you! Just like the rest of world!''
''Tha-That'd nev-never happen! I-I triple checked everything twice you evil little grem-gremllin!''
''Nishishishi I know you did Miu. Did you think I was doubting the Ultimate INVENTOR?!''
''Ye-Yes-''
''WELL THAT WAS A LIE! Gosh your dumb!''
''No I'm not! I'm a genius!''
''Then where's Shuichi?''
''I-I-I don't know.''
''Yes you do Miu. I don't like it when other people lie so don't do that.''
''Bu-but I don't know where he is-''
''Yes you do! He's with Kaede and NOT YOU! Jeez Miu I just said stop lying are you even really the Ultimate Inventor or is that a lie? Kidding! We both know that Shuichi's with Kaede and not you right now!''
''We-well he's not here-''
''So then he's with KAEDE, MIU! And why is he there?''
''Because my tits are too big for that virgin bit-''
''BECAUSE HE LOVES HER MIU! HER AND NOT YOU! So c'mon Miu what's this machine for?''
''TO MAKE HIM LOVE ME AND NOT HER!''
''That's right!''

They both looked over to Miu Iruma the Ultimate Inventor's new creation. The love throne five thousand and three! Guaranteed to make Shuichi Saihara forget all about his girlfriend Kaede and fall solely in love with the gorgeous girl genius with the brain of gold Miu Iruma! At the flip of a switch of this high-tech throne would open up and whoever was sitting in it at the time would fall inside and become trapped within where the padded restraints inside would keep them entombed in an incredibly comfortable silk cushion prison. All of their body would be hidden inside except their feet which could then be stripped bare due to their placement into each armrest of this high-tech throne where they'd be under the fingers of whatever big-titted brilliant godess was sitting in it. The victims mouth would be gagged with a lemon flavored gag held in place by an iron bar making sure that they couldn't make any noise.

''You're sure Pooichi likes lemons?''
''Oh yeah he loves them. He's crazy about sour things but they've gotta be crazy sour ! That's totally true and not at all a lie!''
'What?''
''NOT A LIE!''

Inside all the poor person would see is what the headset would show them which in this case would be Miu Iruma showing off her best ''assets''. They'd be completely immobilized and entirely at the mercy of whoever was sitting in the chair when it was activated and they were dragged inside. Miu had been assured multiple times that this would lead to her crush the shy Shuichi Saihara the Ultimate Detective to fall in love with her because....

-1. According to Kokichi: Shuichi love to be dominated. It was a kink of his which Kaede had found out about and exploited to get the young sleuth's to date her.
-2. According to Kokichi: Shuichi was insanely ticklish especially on his feet. Something he was ashamed of causing him to hide his eye's out of fear someone figured it out. Something which Kaede had found out and used to trap the youthful crimefighter into dating her.
-3. According to Kokichi: Shuichi was actually secretly into being tickled and had always fantasized about getting his brains tickled out by the person who would one day marry him and many loving tickle filled nights with. Something which Kaede had found out and used to enslave the young gumshoe's mind.
-4. According to Kokichi overwhelming a person with things they loved could allow you to add a new and mkae them love it. This was information Kokichi had gotten directly from the Ultimate Therapist herself!
-5. According to Kokichi none of these were lies at all.
As Miu left to find Shuichi and bring him back to the trapped throne Kokichi smile since only one part of that was a lie. Still as Miu went off to get Shuichi this plan of his looked bulletproof.

However when a giggling Makoto Naegi stumbled in Kokichi amended his plans to include him. Now all he had to do was get Sakura to leave and he could see if if more than one person could fit in there...
121.title: She thought she did? Instead Kokichi is waiting...

choices: The hands explore another area!
Monokuma gets tired, adding more distractions to the mix!
An article of clothing was taken away from Kaede!
13.content:
Groaning as she woke up, Kaede’s eyelids fluttered as she struggled to get her bearings. The last things she remembered were that both Shuichi and her had found an unlocked storage room in the upper levels while exploring. When they went in to investigate after hearing something being knocked over, her companion’s strangled cough could be heard before her vision went black… Oh god, something had attacked Shuichi!

“upupupupu… Wakey Wakey, Rise and Shiney!” Trying to turn her head to see the source of the familiar yet creepy laughter, the blonde gasped at finding herself strapped down to a pianist’s chair by a thick metal band over her thighs. Luckily for her, it seemed that was all Monokuma had done, judging by the fact that her pink sweater, white school shirt and purple-motifed skirt hadn’t been tampered with. “W-What’s going on! What have you done with Shuichi!

“So impatient… And to think I even brought you a present!” Covering his grinning mouth with one paw, Monokuma jumped off the black object in front of Kaede. As the lid opened to reveal a grand piano, a few pages of sheet music were lowered onto their holders. “As for what your boyfriend is doing… Let’s just say I’m working on turning that frown upside down. And that’s a promise, kiddo!”

Finding some relief that Shuichi was at least still alive, the ultimate pianist temporarily turned her attention to the pieces of paper. While Fantasia No.2 in D minor was quite an advanced song, it wasn’t anything too troublesome if someone of her skill level were to play it out. With the items given to her, it couldn’t possibly be that…

“Since you’re so smart in finding that hidden area, I’m pretty sure you have an idea of what to do, don’t you, Kaede-chan?”

“You want me… To play the song? Is that it?”

“Upupupupu, you’re much more clever than you let on… Maybe even too clever…” Monokuma sat on the glossy cover, kicking his legs as he mulled about. “A-Anyway, don’t get too carried away! If you can play the song without making any mistakes, I’ll let you and that emo-detective go free!”

“And what if I mess up?” Feeling a chill run down her spine as the lifeless beardroid turned to face her, Kaede could have sworn that its glowing crimson eyes were digging into her very soul. “I don’t think I'll need to tell you what happens if that comes around, Kaede-chan. It would be extremely troublesome to clean someone’s guts off of this large noisemaker, upupupupu.”

Feeling a small knot of fear at the insinuation of the hidden threat, Kaede slapped both her cheeks with her palms. If she, the ultimate pianist, couldn’t play this piece of music, what hope did everyone else have with Monokuma’s little challenges? Closing her eyes as she calmly breathed out, her fingers placed themselves on the first notes from years of practice. Opening her eyes with newfound determination, the blonde began to play the first part of the tri-factra masterpiece.

“Oh did I forget to mention Kaede-chan…” Kaede tried to ignore Monokuma’s eerie words. Just nearby however, her trained ears could barely make out the sound of something over the flowing music… Was it clapping? “Your wonderful audience would also like a more… interactive participation!”

With two ghostly floating hands now coming into view, the blonde gulped as her eyes followed the moving appendages, even as her own continued to play the song from pure memory. Closing her eyes to block out the new interference, Kaede almost squealed in surprise when the two hands clamped against her sides with wiggling fingers. “W-What! Y-You didn’t say anything about floating hands!”

“Oh, did I? My bad, upupupupu~!” Snickering as Monokuma watched the hands work their magic, Kaede failed to suppress a crooked grin from appearing on her mouth. While their movements were somewhat ticklish, the woolly thickness of her sweater prevented most of the distracting prods from doing their job.

131.content: Soon the hands stopped squeezing her sides, and Kaede continued to focus on the task at hand. She played the notes with ease, filtering out the distractions as more hands approached her. Her outstretched arms flowed over the keys with grace and beauty, that is, until something poked her armpit. She flinched violently, almost pressing a wrong note. Unable to suppress a grin, she twitched and squirmed as another hand began lightly teasing her other armpit, almost causing her to fail the task at hand. "Nnnhhp!" She grunted under her breath, continuing the song. The hands began scratching at the sensitive skin, causing her to break into panicked laughter, trying not to fail playing the song. C! The discordant note rung out, and Kaede knew she had failed. The grand piano was slowly pulled from view as her hands were forced above her head, and strapped to the newly extended chair. "Upupupupu! Looks like the pianist failed!" Monokuma cooed, snickering at her misfortune. She glared at the bear, squirming in her bonds. "Let me go, you... sadist!" She snapped at him. He said nothing, but she could feel the presence of more hands, and somehow she knew some were armed with tools...

133.content:
Kaede was thankful when she felt the hands start to leave her sides alone, the Ultimate Pianist now able to allow her fingers to glide through the piano keys, playing the song to absolute perfection. The only thing that scared the the piano freak at the moment was the fact that Monokuma had chosen a very long song for her to do.

“Upupupupupupu!” Monokuma laughed sadistically, prompting Kaede to glance in his direction. “It seems like your body is rather well protected there, isn’t it? Well that’s no fun, so I’m allowing the audience to break through the barriers in order to see their favorite Ultimate smile!~”

As Monokuma finished his sentence, Kaede soon felt multiple hands tugging at her clothes, the girl struggling to stay still. It wasn’t really a problem, though, and Kaede was wondering what this had to do with the entire small speech that Monokuma had just presented.

Unfortunately, she’d learn it’s meaning moments after her initial thoughts, as her sweater and the off-white dress shirt underneath it were ripped off of her body with force, making her almost fall over. She soon felt uncomfortable, the reason being unknown to most.

However, Monokuma didn’t classify under that category of most.

“Aww, it seems that the piano freak is a bit...hmmm, what’s the word I’m looking for?” Monokuma rubbed his cheeks, pretending as if he was actually looking for the dreaded word that plagued Kaede’s mind whenever she was exposed like this.

“Oh yeah! She’s fat!” The black-and-white bear stated, grinning evilly as he did.

Akamatsu began to struggle with her focus on that. Whenever she was around any of the other girls, she just felt hopelessly outclassed in looks and her body. Things like the more toned bodies of Maki and Tenko, the more slender bodies of Tsumugi, Kirumi, and Angie, and the more plump yet still skinny body of Miu made her more than aware of the extra weight that her body held compared to all of the other girls...except Himiko, but it looked like she hasn’t actually hit puberty yet.

Despite the deep, dark thoughts plaguing Kaede’s mind, she played the song with no issues. Unfortunately, that wouldn’t last long, as a hand poked her now exposed side.

“KYAAAAAH!!!” Kaede squeaked, her body slightly jerking away from the hand and almost making her input a wrong note. Her eyes widened as she realized that if this were to be how she would act whenever the hands touched her, the life of Shuichi would be sealed.

“Upupupupu! Looks like the your clothes were the only thing protecting your body, tubby~” Monokuma stated as he chuckled into his hands, clearly enjoying the desperation that had appeared on Kaede’s face.

Soon enough, the hands descended all over her belly. Add the fact that Monokuma had just called her ‘Tubby’, and the torturing of the poor blonde had increased significantly.

“N-NOOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO
STOHOHOHOHOHOHOHP!!!!!” Kaede exploded into some of the most delightful laughter one could hear, even rivaling her piano skills in how much one would want to hear. Contrary to her laughter, though, Akamatsu refused to move around enough to make her mess up. As much as the ticklish torment and the insulting comments and name-calling hurt her, nothing would hurt more than to, lose her best friend.

Still, her belly was easily one of the most ticklish spots on her body, making it way too hard to fight the tickles~

“Upupupupupu, looks like we’ll need to up the game a bit~” Monokuma said, the hands soon slowing down so that they could stop. However, in that time, Monokuma discovered a little secret about Kaede’s pudgy belly.

“NYAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!” Kaede laughed even harder as the hands lightly stroked her belly. It seemed that not only did verbal teases torture her, but lighter, more teasing tickles on her belly worked even more. It was almost enough to make her mess up, but she stayed strong as her slightly chubby belly was tickled.

Monokuma chuckled, knowing that the girl would be quite resilient in this circumstance. After all, her life was on the line, and if she died, Shuichi would possibly be stuck wherever he was.

Of course, the bear didn’t want her to win! So, he decided to move onto his next plan of attack...

Chiaki kept laughing her loud, angelic laughter. She didn’t beg, or even speak with the Ultimate Despair, as she knew it’d be as fruitless as submitting to Junko. There was no point to verbalizing or listening to the torturer, who’d endeavor and capitalize on her phrenic state being messed with. There was no reason in doing anything but trying to tank all the tickles like a tank class would tank attacks.

After ten minutes, Junko had ceased the torture, unsatisfied that no imploring or such was engendered by the Ultimate Gamer. She checked the stats, and Chiaki had a 10/10 ticklishness on her belly, and she still resisted it so well! (Even if she was in tears and desperately try to regain her breath.)
So what was the fashionista going to do to make her beg?

Suddenly, and idea sprang forth in Junko’s head, the Fashionista smiling evily.

That idea was...

''Well you all voted! Rantaro will be sacrificed! How sickeningly noble of Mr. Amami!''

Rantaro Amami the Ultimate Adventurer cast his eye's downward. He knew they'd do it. He begged them to do it. He'd pleaded with Tsumugi to let him sacrifice himself to save them and as his platform and her's lowered down he thought to himself that he'd do it all again.

-One year later-

''Oh Rantaro. Rantaaro wake up.'' the familiar voice of the person who he'd believed to be Tsumugi Shirogane woke him. His eye's slowly opened to her smiling face holding up a protein bar. It was the peanut butter one again, he knew it. He'd told whoever she was once during the Killing Game that he hated peanut butter. Now ever since she'd declared herself his manager that was all he'd eaten for a year. She'd hand feed it to him saying his physique was a big selling point of his popularity and that he'd need the energy for his training session. That had led to 'Monokuma's Special Workout'' 8 hours of Rantaro in weight machine holding a 25 pound weight in an incredibly specific position above his head. If even a single inch was moved the special devices would activate and stiff peacock feathers would whirl in his bare and oiled armpits at a steady pace. Loose shackles keeping his hands above his head but with enough room to incur ''Punishment Time'' if he tried to slack off.

After his usual daily workout Rantaro was given a fresh set of clothes and underwear and hustled off for a ''press conference'' about his future plans. Tsumugi reassured him by saying ''Nobody's going to hurt you Rantaro. It'll be nobody but your adoring public. They love you to bit's! We'll stop them before they do that so don't worry.''
He was brought out before a crowd all wearing ''Danganronpa'' shirts and hat's. There were two raised platforms one had a podium with several microphone's Tsumugi took up place there. The other had a set of stocks Rantaro assumed that was his. He was shoved by his ''bodyguards'' towards them.

''Tsumugi now re-really.''
''Come on now Rantaro-chan we've worked together for a while. You know how your fan's can get. Team Danganronpa needs to protect our product! This is just so you don't get carried off during the ''Fan Interaction'' segment. Alllso call me Tsumugi-kun we are former classmates after all.''
''Still though thi-this is''
''Do you want to disappoint your public? Get in there Rantaro-chan or we'll just have to auction off some merchandise to calm them down. The clothes off your back seem like they'd be in high demand.''

Imagining that this wouldn't be any better for him in his birthday suit Amami bent over towards the opened stocks but was stopped by a heavy hand on his shoulder. He looked back at one of his bodyguards who was shaking his head.

In unorthodox fashion though he was face up in the bonds so that now he was staring up into the blue sky with his back uncomfortably arched. ''Upupupu~~ hello all of my fellow fans of Danganronpa!'' the crowd cheered as she continued on.

There's many different ways to spread Despair or to spread the light of hope! Tickling can be one of them.!

Rules
-Tickling may be the title but honestly I'm fine with whatever kind of fetish in here folks so go nuts!--
-Boy or Girl do whatever!
-No killing! You want that? Go to the actual series there's plenty there.
-There are going to be spoilers. Don't like that leave. Sorry
-Boy on Boy, Girl on Girl, Monokuma on Boy whatever's fine.
-Get as dirty as you want
-If there abit OOC that's also fine.
-No crazy short chapters. Two or three paragraphs at the very least please!
-C'mon check your spelling.
-First Person, Third Person whatever as well
-Tickle or be tickled

Simple and to the point let's get going!
It's tickling time!
